title: Pixel Buds Pro have to make up for Google’s biggest earbud mistakes
content:
Google’s legacy in earbuds is… complicated. There’s been a lot to love with the Pixel Buds series, but also some serious mistakes. Now, we’re preparing for the launch of the Pixel Buds Pro, and they have to learn from Google’s mistakes and problems to date.

more…

The post Pixel Buds Pro have to make up for Google’s biggest earbud mistakes appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: When they arrive this July, Google needs to avoid the problems of its past Pixel Buds to let the Pixel Buds Pro succeed.
